description: Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) - Wharf Pile Repairs
full_summary:
# ITQ - Wharf Pile Repairs (Sandy Cove East, Digby Co., NS)

## Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: WS4157354361
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4157354361
* **Publication Date**: 2023-08-21
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-09-06T14:00:00 [expired]
* **Procurement Category**: Construction and Infrastructure Services
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notice Type**: Invitation to Qualify
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Project Description

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) and the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) require a contractor to perform wharf pile repair services at Sandy Cove East, Digby Co., NS. The project involves the partial removal of existing concrete jackets and the installation of new concrete protection jackets on existing steel h-piles. The estimated cost is between $100,001 and $500,000.

## Eligibility and Requirements

To be eligible to submit a qualification submission, suppliers must be able to provide the required services. The contractor must also comply with all applicable laws, regulations, and standards. Proposals must be submitted via SAP Ariba by the tender closing date.

## Contact Information

If you have any questions or concerns regarding this tender, please contact Nicole Fesseha, Contracting Authority, at:

* **Email**: nicole.fesseha@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: [not available]
* **Website**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17222892?extsite=MTcyMjI4OTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## Language of Communication

Proposals may be submitted in either English or French.

I also reformatted the text to make it more readable and easier to follow. Let me know if you have any further requests!
